messages.subject: Re: info needed !!!
messages.msgSnippet: Around 1530s is the last period in which Hosokawa clan had a strong power.Soon after their retainer Miyoshi had a power,They became weaker and weaker. They had
messages.messageBody:
Around 1530s is the last period in which Hosokawa clan had a strong
power.Soon after their retainer Miyoshi had a power,They became
weaker and weaker.
They had holdings of Sanuki,Tosa,Awaji,Settsu,Izumi,Awaji,Tanba and
Bicchu around this period.And among them, the Souke(I don't know its
English Equivalent,Prime family?The master of it was appointed
Kanrei) had Sanuki,Tosa,Settsu,Izumi and Tanba.
So It can be said their fiefs was around Osaka Bay, Setouchi sea and
Shikoku region.

Hope


--- In samuraihistory@y..., "Lavoie Sylvain" <speed.freak@s...> wrote:
> I need some information about the Hosokawa clan around 1530's . I
know they have the title of Kanrei but i want to know the
geographical location of their holdings: Fiefs, regions for this
period. Thanx in advance.
>
> Speedfreak
>
>
> [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.messageBody:
I need some information about the Hosokawa clan around 1530's . I know they have the title of Kanrei but i want to know the geographical location of their holdings: Fiefs, regions for this period. Thanx in advance.

Speedfreak
